rules_text:
When this creature enters, cache the top card of your library face-down. [i](Look at it, then exile it face down. Create a Memory enchantment token with “{2}, Sacrifice this:You may play the cached card this turn.”)[/i]
Activated abilities of Memories you control cost {1} less to activate.
notes:
type C
art3

Lady-o'-War

When this creature enters, return up to one target tapped creature to its owner's hand.

“The errors? Oh, they've been delightful. To be honest, I was in a slump for the last 45 centuries at least, so it's good to have some excitement.”
